dataframes.name: df
dataframes.dtypesStr:
Book title      object
Authors name    object
Book review     object
Discount        object
Value           object
dtype: object

precedingCells.source:
import requests
from bs4 import BeautifulSoup
import pandas as pd

titles_list = []
authors_list = []
reviews_list = []
discounts_list = []
prices_list = []

cell.source:
for i in range (1,200)
url = 'https://www.flipkart.com/books/fiction-nonfiction-books/literature-fiction-books/science-fiction-books/pr?sid=bks%2Cfnf%2Cgld%2Cl9q&otracker=clp_banner_1_9.bannerX3.BANNER_theliterature-fiction-store_N3TNKEQF6D6W&fm=neo%2Fmerchandising&iid=M_ba0e5cbf-455c-4e70-850b-954fc8983979_9.N3TNKEQF6D6W&ppt=browse&ppn=browse&ssid=6ttpm7g3v40000001737186122646&page='+str(i)
response = requests.get (url)
soup = BeautifulSoup (response.text,'lxml')

titles = soup.find_all ('a',class_='wjcEIp')
for title in titles:
  titles_list.append (title.text.strip())

authors = soup.find_all ('div',class_='NqpwHC')
for author in authors:
  authors_list.append (author.text.strip())

reviews = soup.find_all ('span',class_='Wphh3N')
for review in reviews:
  reviews_list.append (review.text.strip())

discounts = soup.find_all ('div',class_='UkUFwK')
for discount in discounts:
  discounts_list.append (discount.text.strip())

prices = soup.find_all ('div',class_='Nx9bqj')
for price in prices:
  prices_list.append (price.text.strip())

print(titles_list)
print(authors_list)
print(reviews_list)
print(discounts_list)
print(prices_list)

min_length = min(len(titles_list),
                len(authors_list),
                len(reviews_list),
                len(discounts_list),
                len(prices_list))

titles_list = titles_list [:min_length]
authors_list = authors_list [:min_length]
reviews_list =reviews_list [:min_length]
discounts_list = discounts_list [:min_length]
prices_list = prices_list [:min_length]
                      
df = pd.DataFrame ({'Book title':titles_list,
                    'Authors name':authors_list,
                   'Book review':reviews_list,
                   'Discount':discounts_list,
                   'Value':prices_list
                   })

print(df)
